At the time of posting FF7 was still in beta, so I doubt this can be final. BTW, FF is free software, so for the latest release your best bet is the FF site itself. There's no gain from downloading it from TPB.
@sv504: you are wrong the final was already out on 26th. if you are referring to the firefox autoupdate function, it takes a while until new versions are shown in it (2-3days).
